text: Jack Nilson (15 March 1919 – 31 October 1970) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Profile on Collingwood Forever Category:1919 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Brunswick Football Club players
title: Jack Nilson
